title: 158 Magic Relics Icons - Collection on a transparent background
description: Introducing the "158 Magic Relics Icons - Collection on a transparent background" - collection, meticulously crafted to enhance your fantasy game projects with a touch of realism
longDescription:
Introducing the "1158 Magic Relics Icons - Collection on a transparent background" - collection, meticulously crafted to enhance your fantasy game projects with a touch of realism. This premium asset pack features 158 unique icons, each rendered in a high-resolution, realistic style, perfect for a variety of gaming genres. Whether you are developing an RPG, an adventure game, or any fantasy-themed interactive experience, these icons will elevate your user interface and game design.


Key Features:


High-Resolution Graphics: Each icon is designed in a 500x500 pixel format, ensuring crisp and detailed visuals that look great on any device.

Transparent Backgrounds: All icons are provided with transparent backgrounds in PNG format, offering versatile use across various backgrounds and interfaces.

Wide Variety: The pack includes a diverse array of artifacts, from mystical weapons and enchanted jewelry to arcane books and magical scrolls, catering to a broad range of game mechanics and storytelling elements.

Ease of Integration:


These icons are ready to be dropped into your project right out of the box. The standardized PNG format and consistent dimensions make integration straightforward, ensuring that you can focus on creativity without worrying about technical constraints.


Versatility in Usage:


Role-Playing Games: Use the icons for inventory items, quest objects, or shop interfaces.

Adventure Games: Enhance the immersive experience by incorporating these icons into puzzles and collectibles.

Mobile Games: Optimized for performance and clarity, these icons are ideal for touch-based interfaces.

File Formats and Technical Details:


File Format: PNG

Resolution: 500x500 pixels

Background: Transparent

Number of Icons: 158

Support and Updates:


This is the first version of the asset pack. We are committed to regularly updating the collection based on user feedback and emerging trends in game development. We encourage you to share your suggestions and experiences to help us improve and evolve the product.


Feedback and Reviews:


Your feedback is invaluable! Please consider leaving a review or rating. Your insights not only help us improve but also inform other developers about the potential benefits of incorporating these icons into their projects.


Contact for Support:


For support or inquiries, please contact us at oskrobina@gmail.com We are here to assist you with any questions or issues regarding the integration and use of these assets.


Enhance your game's aesthetic and functionality with "158 Magic Artifact Icons." Elevate your project and captivate your players by integrating these professionally designed icons today!
